text_lines: The Centre for Professional Communication (CPC) at SIT offers critical thinking and communication courses and services that serve to enhance the communication knowledge and skills of our undergraduate and postgraduate students.

CPC drives the Communicating Across the Curriculum (CAC) initiative that supports SIT’s unique curriculum. The initiative provides our students a firm grounding in critical thinking and communication skills, preparing them to become versatile and effective professionals in the workplace. The Centre also conducts continuing education and training (CET) programmes for working professionals, as well as customised corporate training for organisations to upgrade their employees' communication skills to stay relevant and competitive. Working closely with industry partners and other universities, CPC conducts research in diverse fields, as well as consults and develops innovative communication solutions

Centre for Professional Communication
The Centre for Professional Communication (CPC) at SIT offers critical thinking and communication courses and services that serve to enhance the communication knowledge and skills of our undergraduate and postgraduate students.
CPC drives the Communicating Across the Curriculum (CAC) initiative that supports SIT’s unique curriculum. The initiative provides our students a firm grounding in critical thinking and communication skills, preparing them to become versatile and effective professionals in the workplace. The Centre also conducts continuing education and training (CET) programmes for working professionals, as well as customised corporate training for organisations to upgrade their employees' communication skills to stay relevant and competitive. Working closely with industry partners and other universities, CPC conducts research in diverse fields, as well as consults and develops innovative communication solutions
